channel.title: Sierra County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Sierra County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-25 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-25 north. Distance to San Antonio, Socorro, and Albuquerque.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 100
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 100 - Red Rock.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 92
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 92 - Mitchell Point.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 189
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 189. This exit does not have any destinations northbound. Southbound Exit 189 is signed: NM-52/NM-181/Cuchillo/Monticello.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 83
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 83 - NM-195/City of Elephant Butte.

item.title: BL-25 North at I-25 Jct.
item.description: BL-25 north at I-25 junction. Merge right for I-25 north to Albuquerque; merge left for I-25 south to Las Cruces.

item.title: BL-25 North Approaching I-25
item.description: BL-25 north approaching I-25. Use left lane for Las Cruces (I-25 south).

item.title: BL-25 South at NM-181
item.description: BL-25 south at NM-181 north to City of Elephant Butte.

item.title: BL-25 South at NM-181
item.description: BL-25 south at NM-181 in Truth or Consequences.

item.title: BL-25 South at NM-118
item.description: BL-25 south at NM-118. Merge right for BL-25 to Truth or Consequences business district.

item.title: I-25 North at Exit 80 Offramp
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 80 offramp, BL-25 jct. Turn right for Truth or Consequences, City of Elephant Butte, and Elephant Butte State Park.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 79
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 79 - BL-25/Truth or Consequences.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 75
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 75 - BL-25/Williamsburg/Truth of Consequences. This is the southern end of the Truth of Consequences business loop.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 71
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 72 - Los Palomas. The exit number tab is missing from this sign.

item.title: NM-152 West at I-25
item.description: NM-152 West at I-25 in rural Sierra County.

item.title: I-25 North Offramp (Exit 63) at NM-152
item.description: I-25 North Exit 63 offramp at NM-152. Turn left for NM-152 west to Hillsboro and Silver City.

item.title: NM-152 East Approaching NM-187
item.description: End NM-152 east approaching NM-187, in rural Sierra County.

item.title: NM-152 East at I-25
item.description: NM-152 east at I-25. Turn right for I-25 south to Las Cruces; continue under overpass for I-25 north to Socorro.

item.title: NM-152 East at NM-27
item.description: NM-152 east at NM-27 south to Deming and Lake Valley. Continue east on NM-152 for Truth or Consequences (T or C).

item.title: NM-152 East Approaching NM-27
item.description: NM-152 east approaching NM-27 south in Hillsboro.

item.title: NM-152 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NM-152 east. Distance to Hillsboro and Truth or Consequences.
